## ThirdwebStorageOptions type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type ThirdwebStorageOptions<T extends UploadOptions> = {
  uploader?: IStorageUploader<T>;
  downloader?: IStorageDownloader;
  gatewayUrls?: GatewayUrls;
};
```

**References:** [UploadOptions](./storage.uploadoptions.md), [IStorageUploader](./storage.istorageuploader.md), [IStorageDownloader](./storage.istoragedownloader.md), [GatewayUrls](./storage.gatewayurls.md)
